gcci.text: H100 supply chain constraints easing as foundries ramp 4nm production, driving capex ROI above 18% for new deployments.

gtpi.text: API pricing compression accelerating as frontier models compete on efficiency, with distilled variants reaching sub-$1/1M input costs.

gagl.text: 120 TWh annual AI load pushing grid infrastructure toward SMR nuclear baseload to maintain reliability during peak inference.

aipi.text: Industry entering rationalization phase as venture funding concentrates on provable ROI, signaling sustainable long-term growth trajectory.
